佹字的基本解释

佹
guǐ
乘戾；背离。
累积；重叠。
依。
古通“诡”。

佹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǐ］
［《廣韻》過委切，上紙，見。］
(1)乖戾。
(2)重累相叠。
(3)诡异；诡怪。参见“佹異”、“佹詩”。
(4)见“佹侘”。
[②]［guī］
［《集韻》俱爲切，平支，見。］
(1)庶几；将要。参见“佹2佹”。
(2)忽，时而。

佹字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　佹； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页100第27
【廣韻】過委切【集韻】【韻會】古委切，?音詭。重累也。一曰依也。又戾也。【周禮·冬官考工記察其菑蚤不齲註】菑爪不相佹。　又欐佹，支柱也。【司馬相如·上林賦】連卷欐佹，或作?。　又【佹詩】荀卿以避讒入楚，春申君以爲蘭陵令，春申君謝荀卿，荀卿去之趙。春申君又使人請卿，卿不還，遺春申君佹詩。【註】?佹異激切之辭，詳言天下不治之意。　又【淮南子·齊俗訓】爭爲佹辯，久積而不訣。　又佹諸，人名。見【左傳·僖九年】。　又【集韻】【韻會】?俱爲切，音嬀。幾似貌。

佹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
佹字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
guǐ
Ridicule; deviate.
Accumulate; overlap.
according to.
Gutong is "sly".
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǐ］
["Guangyun" has been cut, put on paper, see you. ]
(1) Be surly.
(2) Overlapping each other.
(3) Weird; weird. See "Yiyi", "Yiyi".
(4) See "佹侘".
[②]［guī］
["Jiyun" is all cut, flat support, see. ]
(1) Shuji; about to. See "Qi 2 Ji".
(2) Suddenly, from time to time.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　佹; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 100 Page 27
[Guang Yun] Gu Weiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ancient Weiqie, sound tricky. Tired too. Yi said Yi Ye. It's too cruel. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Examination of Workers' Records to Observe that the Claws and Fleas are not Caries Note] The Claws are not related to each other.　Again, the pillar is also. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Consecutive scrolls, or writing.　[Yi Poem] Xun Qing entered Chu to avoid slander, Chun Shen Jun thought of Lanling Order, Chun Shen Jun Xun Qing Xun Qing, Xun Qing went to Zhao. Chun Shenjun asked people to invite Qing, but the Qing did not return it, leaving Chun Shenjun as a poem. [Note]? Different and ardent remarks, and elaborate on the meaning of the world incurable.　[Huainanzi·Qi Suxun] Arguing for the other, accumulating for a long time without knowing how to do it.　Again, the names of people. See [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Nine Years].　[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? All cut, sound Zhuo. Almost looks like.
